title: Education
intro: I have always enjoyed studying, analysing and truly understanding the concepts I am working with. After finishing University I have never stopped learning myself and I also completed lots of various courses on web development topics.

records.title: Computer Science
records.description:
I studied Computer Science full-time in Vilnius University Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics. Not only I enjoyed this period of my life, but also most of the time I was Nr.1 student of the entire course and during all 4 years of studies received an Enlarged Grant for high study results.

Read more about my studies in Vilnius University »

records.title: Mathematics and Mathematics Applications Studies
records.description: Lithuanian School for Young Mathematicians is a remote studies programme maintained by Vilnius University Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics with a final problem-solving competition held in Vilnius University. The programme covers various mathematical topics and problems that are more complex that the ones required for Final National Exams, in fact, it can be considered as serious preparation for Maths and Computer Science Studies in Vilnius University. I completed the programme in addition to my Secondary Education.

records.title: Secondary Education
records.description: Secondary Education takes 12 years in Lithuania, finished by series of Final National Exams. I chose to study a technical set of subjects and several foreign languages and completed with honours by earning excellent grades in all of the subjects.
